TerrainAndBathymetry.description: Physical and geological properties of the seafloor and terrain affecting navigation and mission feasibility.

SeafloorCharacterization.description: Describes physical seabed properties including texture, hardness, and structure.

TerrainGradientAnalysis.description: Captures slope, gradient, and elevation data relevant to vehicle operation or survey feasibility.

SurveyCoverageAssessment.description: Includes mapping resolution, overlap, and data completeness for survey areas.

EnvironmentalAndOceanographicConditions.description: Dynamic environmental factors influencing route selection and mission timing.

CurrentsAndTides.description: Ocean current and tidal data including predictions and models.

SeaStateAndWeather.description: Wave height, swell, and environmental conditions affecting access and operations.

WaterColumnProperties.description: Temperature, salinity, and density factors influencing vehicle navigation or sensor performance.

VehicleCapabilitiesAndConstraints.description: Vehicle-specific operational parameters and limitations affecting route feasibility.

PerformanceParameters.description: Speed, endurance, and depth capabilities under mission conditions.

SensorAndSystemLimits.description: Sensor range, accuracy, and integration with mission parameters.

LaunchRecoveryConstraints.description: Constraints and procedures for deployment and recovery.

NavigationAndPositioning.description: Positional accuracy, route planning, and geospatial data essential to mission navigation.

PositioningSystems.description: GPS and navigation system configuration, accuracy, and reliability.

RouteSafetyAndHazards.description: Hazards, obstructions, and no-go zones impacting navigation.

ChartingAndGeospatialData.description: Digital and vector chart data supporting mission planning.

MissionParametersAndObjectives.description: Defines mission intent, constraints, and evaluation metrics for route and task performance.

OperationalObjectives.description: Mission-specific goals, deliverables, and success criteria.

TaskSchedulingAndTiming.description: Time-on-task estimates, timing constraints, and operational windows.

EvaluationCriteria.description: Measurable performance indicators for assessing mission success.

ThreatsAndRiskManagement.description: Operational and cyber risk factors that must be identified, assessed, and mitigated.

OperationalRisk.description: Risks associated with equipment failure, loss, or unsafe operating conditions.

CyberRisk.description: Information security and communication vulnerabilities affecting mission execution.

ContingencyPlanning.description: Abort and recovery strategies to mitigate mission failure.

HistoricalAndContextualData.description: Prior mission data, operational benchmarks, and historical references informing planning.

PreviousMissionData.description: Records and performance data from past missions.

OperationalBenchmarks.description: Comparative data for assessing current mission parameters.

DataProductsAndRequirements.description: Data types, formats, and quality metrics necessary for supporting mission planning and evaluation.

SensorDataProducts.description: Primary data outputs such as multibeam, sonar, or optical datasets.

DerivedDataProducts.description: Processed or analytic data derived from sensor inputs.

DataQualityAndMetadata.description: Quality indicators, confidence zones, and metadata requirements.

CommunicationsAndControl.description: Information transfer, telemetry, and command-control mechanisms supporting mission coordination.

TelemetrySystems.description: Data link and telemetry infrastructure for vehicle monitoring.

ControlSystems.description: Command and control protocols for mission and vehicle operations.

CommunicationsResilience.description: Procedures for managing loss of communication or degraded signal environments.

OperationalLogistics.description: Physical deployment, access, and operational coordination for mission execution.

DeploymentAndRecovery.description: Physical processes for launching and retrieving assets.

OperationalConstraints.description: Spatial, temporal, and environmental limitations on mission operations.

AccessAndMobility.description: Approach, transit, and access conditions affecting operational readiness.
